Notice.Description:
Recommended usage for Mod Organizer users:
1. Add Bethini Pie as an executable and run through Mod Organizer.
2. Leave the INI Path below at the default Documents\My Games\FalloutNV location. This will ensure the Mod Organizer VFS redirects to the correct INI files for your current profile.

Game Path.tooltip: Specifies the path to the game directory.

INI Path.tooltip: Specifies the path to the INI files.

Remove Unknown Settings.tooltip: Toggles whether or not unrecognized settings are removed from the INI files.

Display Mode.tooltip: Sets the display mode, whether full screen or windowed.

Antialiasing.tooltip: Sets the level of antialiasing (AA) applied to edges to make them smoother and less jagged.

Water Antialiasing.tooltip: Sets the level of antialiasing applied to water.

Anisotropic Filtering.tooltip: Sets the level of anisotropic filtering (AF), improving the texture quality of distant objects.

Always Active.tooltip: Toggles the ability of the game to remain active when it is out of focus (i.e. if in a windowed mode setup, if one clicks outside the game window with this enabled, the game will not pause).

VSync.tooltip: Toggles vertical synchronization (VSync), which removes screen tearing.

Transparency AA.tooltip: Toggles transparency antialiasing on textures for better quality, especially on foliage.

Eyefinity.tooltip: Toggles support for AMD Eyefinity display configurations. Disabling this may be necessary for granular control of other settings to work.

Camera FOV.tooltip: Sets the camera field of view.

Hands FOV.tooltip: Sets the hands field of view, affecting the arms and weapons viewmodel seen in 1st person.

Pip-Boy FOV.tooltip: Sets the Pip-Boy and terminal field of view.

Default FOV.tooltip: Sets the field of view in menus, such as the lockpicking interface.

Reset to Default.tooltip:
Resets your INI files to their default values.

Note that not all settings will be set to their default values, as you probably don't want us to touch your screen resolution and mouse look sensitivity... that sorta thing ;)

Apply Recommended Tweaks.tooltip: This sets certain recommended tweaks for all users.

Bethini Presets.tooltip:
Changes the preset buttons to use Bethini Presets.

Hint: These presets are better ;)

Vanilla Presets.tooltip: Changes the preset buttons to use the vanilla presets.

Remove Borders.tooltip: Toggles off the borders at the edges of the map.

Cells Unload upon Fast Travel.tooltip: Toggles the ability for the game to unload cells upon fast travel, lowering memory usage.

Preemptively Unload Cells.tooltip: Toggles the ability for the game to unload cells preemptively to lessen memory usage.

Background Load Lip Files.tooltip: Toggles the ability for the game to background load lip files used by NPCs, which can reduce stutter when loading multiple NPCs.

iNumHWThreads.tooltip: Values of 3 or more spreads AI and game logic updates across 2 threads for better performance.

Save on Travel.tooltip: Toggles autosaves made after traveling to different locations.

Missing Content Warning.tooltip: Toggles the missing content warning when loading a saved game missing a previously enabled plugin.

Always Run by Default.tooltip: Toggles the ability of the character to always run by default. If turned off, you can still run, but walking is the default action.

Combat Dialogue.tooltip: Toggles those cheeky comments that enemies say while in combat.

NPCs Use Ammo.tooltip: Toggles off unlimited NPC ammo. If enabled, NPCs will no longer have access to unlimited ammo, but shall be forced to only use the ammo they possess.

Allow Screenshots.tooltip: Toggles the ability to save a screenshot with the PrintScreen key.

Screenshots Directory.tooltip: Sets the location of game screenshots.

Filename.tooltip: Sets the base filename of game screenshots.

Multithreaded Audio.tooltip: Toggles an additional worker thread for minor performance improvement. Without the New Vegas Tick Fix, this can cause the game to hang when you go to exit the game.

Debug Info.tooltip: Toggles unnecessary copy operations performed on sound data.

Audio Cache Size.tooltip: Sets the audio file cache size.

Max Cached Sound Size.tooltip: Sets the maximum cached sound size.

Main Menu Volume.tooltip: Sets the volume level of the main menu music.

Footstep Distance.tooltip: Sets the maximum distance that footsteps can be heard.

Player Footsteps Volume.tooltip: Sets the volume level of the player's footsteps.

Controller.tooltip: Toggles the ability to use a controller.

Hide Unavailable Perks.tooltip: Toggles the ability for perks whose requirements have not been met to be hidden in the level up menu.

Dialogue Subtitles.tooltip: Toggles subtitles for NPCs who are directly talking to you.

General Subtitles.tooltip: Toggles subtitles for NPCs who are not directly talking to you.

HUD Color.tooltip: Sets the color of the HUD. Be aware that some mods (e.g., Main and Pause Menus Overhaul) may override this setting.

Visible Lines.tooltip: Sets the maximum number of lines visible in the in-game console.

History Size.tooltip: Sets the maximum number of lines to keep in history in the in-game console.

X Position.tooltip: Sets the amount of x (horizontal) units to offset the in-game console.

Y Position.tooltip: Sets the amount of y (vertical) units to offset the in-game console.

Text Color.tooltip: Sets the text color in the in-game console.

Scanlines.tooltip: Sets the amount of scanlines in the Pip-boy.

Blur Intensity.tooltip: Sets the blur intensity, especially of the text, of the Pip-boy.

Blur Radius.tooltip: Sets the blur radius, especially of the text, of the Pip-boy.

Pip-Boy Color.tooltip: Sets the color of the Pip-Boy. Be aware that some mods (e.g., Main and Pause Menus Overhaul) may override this setting.

Flashlight Fade Duration.tooltip: Sets the time it takes to fade the flashlight when opening the Pip-boy when the flashlight is on. Reducing this to around 400 helps alleviate flicker when opening the Pip-Boy when its light is on.

Invert Y.tooltip: Toggles the ability of the the mouse to be inverted over the y-axis (up and down movement).

Look Sensitivity.tooltip: Sets the look sensitivity (how fast the camera moves in response to the mouse).

Depth of Field.tooltip: Toggles depth of field (DOF), a kind of blurring to imitate the human eye's perception. This is most noticeable under water, reducing visibility to realistic levels (it looks clear otherwise).

Texture Quality.tooltip: Sets the quality of textures by skipping mipmap levels. It is recommended to always set this to High to prevent texture bugs.

3.0 Vertex Shader.tooltip: Toggles using 3.0 vertex shader for drawing grass, which allows drawing more grass with better performance.

Minimum Wind.tooltip: Sets the minimum wind magnitude blowing grass.

Maximum Wind.tooltip: Sets the maximum wind magnitude blowing grass.

Disable Gore.tooltip: Toggles gory effects, such as blood.

Max Decals.tooltip: Sets the maximum number of decals.

Max Decals Per Frame.tooltip: Sets the maximum number of decals that can be shown per frame.

Max Skinned Decals.tooltip: Sets the maximum number of skinned decals.

Max Skinned Decals Per Frame.tooltip: Sets the maximum number of skinned decals that can be shown per frame.

Max Skinned Decals Per Actor.tooltip: Sets the maximum number of skinned decals per actor.

Decal Lifetime.tooltip: Sets the time in seconds that some decals will stay visible.

Shadow Resolution.tooltip: Sets the resolution of actor shadows.

Shadow Filtering.tooltip: Sets the level of filtering (a kind of blurring of the edges) to shadows.

Interior Shadow Count.tooltip: Sets the maximum number of actor shadows in interiors.

Exterior Shadow Count.tooltip: Sets the maximum number of actor shadows in exteriors.

Shadow Fade Start.tooltip: Sets the distance where shadows starts to fade.

Shadow Fade Range.tooltip: Sets the range from Shadow Fade Start that shadows fade.

Displacements.tooltip: Toggles water displacements such as ripples. It is recommended to be enabled.

Depth Fog.tooltip: Toggles water depth fog. It is recommended to be enabled.

Refractions.tooltip: Toggles display of water refractions. Water refractions are rendered regardless. It is recommended to be enabled.

Reflections.tooltip: Toggles display of reflections in water. Water reflections are rendered regardless. It is recommended to be enabled.

Full Scene Reflections.tooltip: Toggles full scene reflections in water. This is very performance intensive, as it effectively draws the full scene a second time, so it is recommended to be disabled.

LOD Reflections.tooltip: Toggles LOD reflections in water. It is recommended to be enabled.

Reflection Blur.tooltip: Toggles blurring of reflections in water.

Blur Amount.tooltip: Sets the amount of blurring applied to water reflections.

Reflection Resolution.tooltip: Sets the resolution of water reflections.

Grass Fade Start.tooltip: Sets the distance where grass starts to fade.

Grass Fade Range.tooltip: Sets the range from Grass Fade Start that grass fades (sinks) into the landscape.

Specular Fade Start.tooltip: Sets the distance where specular effects starts to fade.

Specular Fade Range.tooltip: Sets the range from Specular Fade Start that specular effects fade.

Light Fade Start.tooltip: Sets the distance where light starts to fade.

Light Fade Range.tooltip: Sets the range from Light Fade Start that light fades.

Decal Creation.tooltip: Sets the distance that decals can be created, such as bullet impacts.

Skinned Decal Creation.tooltip: Sets the distance that skinned decals can be created.

Decal Fade Start.tooltip: Sets the distance decals start to fade.

Decal Fade End.tooltip: Sets the distance decals are fully faded out.

Skinned Decals Fade Start.tooltip: Sets the distance skinned decals start to fade.

Skinned Decals Fade End.tooltip: Sets the distance skinned decals are fully faded out.

Environment Map Fade Start.tooltip: Sets the distance environment mapping effects start to fade.

Environment Map Fade End.tooltip: Sets the distance environment mapping effects are fully faded out.

Eye Cubemaps Fade Start.tooltip: Sets the distance eye cubemaps start to fade.

Eye Cubemaps Fade End.tooltip: Sets the distance eye cubemaps are fully faded out.

uGridsToLoad.tooltip: Sets how many grids will be actively rendered and processed around the Player Character (PC).

Terrain Multiplier.tooltip: Sets the terrain LOD distance multiplier.

Object LOD Distance.tooltip: Sets the maximum distance to render normal LOD.

High Priority LOD Distance.tooltip: Sets the maximum distance to render "High Priority" LOD.
